list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: relating to or belonging to a profession.
engaged in a specified activity as one's main paid occupation rather than as a pastime.
worthy of or appropriate to a professional person; competent, skillful, or assured.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: their music is both memorable and professional
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Âm nhạc của họ là cả đáng nhớ và chuyên nghiệp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person engaged or qualified in a profession.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: professionals such as lawyers and surveyors
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: các chuyên gia như luật sư và nhà khảo sát

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person engaged in a specified activity, especially a sport or branch of the performing arts, as a main paid occupation rather than as a pastime.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his first season as a professional
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: mùa đầu tiên của anh ấy là một chuyên gia

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person competent or skilled in a particular activity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she was a real professional on stage
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy là một chuyên gia thực sự trên sân khấu
